title: Integrated STEM Project Design Based on Electric Go-Karts

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Project-based education course where learners experience the design, production, and testing processes of electric go-karts through team-based problem-based learning (PBL) and collaborative learning. Integrating theory and practice by combining online and offline activities

learning_goals: Analyze the mechanical and electrical systems of an electric go-kart and propose performance optimization strategies.
Document problem-solving processes through collaborative team projects and systematically organize presentation materials.
Derive creative design solutions under diverse constraints such as energy efficiency, safety, and driving performance.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
